intro: Erythraea tenuifolia, commonly known as the slenderleaf erythraea, is a flowering plant native to the Mediterranean region. It is characterized by its narrow, grass-like leaves and small, pale pink or white flowers that bloom in summer. The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and is adapted to dry, sunny conditions.
